course_description: This is a capstone course that combines health economics and human health content with data science. You will complete an empirical research project using raw data and employ econometric methods to analyze a research question relevant to contemporary health care issues and/or health.
prerequisites: ECON 320 and (ECON 371 or ECON 372 or ECON 372W or HLTH 370) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 4227, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: I. McCarthy, Status: Open
